Reviews.Title: Nice point and shoot
Reviews.Author: Mike K "technoguy"
Reviews.Content: Lately when traveling I bring along a bigger camera for myself and a point and shoot for the kids.  This summer our family trip was to the National Parks of Utah.  For the point and shoot I brought along a little Canon that I had just bought a month earlier and used  twice prior in test shoots.  Unfortunately as soon as we got to Utah it was dead (don't know why).  That meant a trip to Walmart and in about 10 minutes I was leaving with this little camera in hand.  Therefore, I didn't do any pre-purchase research and so I was hoping that I didn't make a mistake.  Luckily, I didn't.The camera is small and thin and attractive (in a camera sort of way).  Controls are very simple to use but there are a lot of point and shoot advanced features like a really cool panorama feature that stitches all of your photos together right in the camera.  We didn't shoot a lot of video with this camera but a little test video that I did looked pretty good for an inexpensive camera.The camera doesn't have a lot of manual controls, but most people who would buy this camera wouldn't use them anyway.  Like many new cameras it has an intelligent auto function that can actually adjust the camera for different types of scenes automatically.  Freeze movement, landscape, macro, and so on.  It also has a "intelligent plus" option for difficult situations like capturing in low light.Battery life seems pretty good and it is so light you won't even know it is in your pocket.  In addition, it comes with a outboard charger so you can easily have an extra battery on hand if you wish.  My kids actually filled up a 4 GB SD card so I feel that I have a pretty good handle on the picture quality which is very nice.  The other camera that I took was a hybrid micro 4 3 camera which (of course) took better pictures, but with some minor tweaking in a photo editor the Sony pictures looked almost as good.Downside?  The camera packs a lot of pixels in a very tiny sensor so low light photos without a flash won't be as good as they could be.  In addition (I think) this camera automatically adjusts the size of the image depending on the photo situation so you may not be getting the full 14 megapixels with each of your photos (at least that is what I have read about other Sony point and shoots).Build quality is OK but the battery compartment is a bit on the flimsy side.  On a positive note, this camera will use SD cards or memory sticks.  SD cards are easy to find when on vacation and have been the standard with these types of cameras.Would I buy it again... absolutely.  Low price and good pictures!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: camNY82 "imaginecarrie"
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this camera in red. Cosmetically, it is very nice looking and compact. I wanted a new camera and am fed up with Kodak - my most recent EasyShare lasted me 2 years before freezing and turning subjects into Casper the friendly ghost, so I decided Kodak quality isn't what it used to be. Whenever I think quality electronics, I immediately think Sony, so why not for cameras? I am not disappointed in my choice. The biggest reason I love this camera is that it takes quick shots. My 16 month old son does NOT like to pose or sit still, so if I want to capture the cute things he does, I need a quick response between pushing the shutter and actually catching the image on the camera. This camera impresses me on that front. I am not a techie, but as a simple needs kinda photographer, I say this is a winner!

Reviews.Title: Good and Affordable point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: S. Bolanos "Love the written word"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a quick camera fix after I dropped mine in a hot tub and grabbed this camera at Best Buy for about 10 dollars more than the listed price. It has pretty decent stabilization, and produces fairly good quality shots in low lighting with a high ISO, for a point and shoot. It also has an interesting soft skin feature that is great for close up portraits, skin looks softer but not fake or overly digital. I took it to disneyland and although the shutter speed is a little too slow for action shots is pretty awesome in every other sense. I would definetly recommend it for the price. The HD video recording feature is awesome, its the first time I have been able to zoom in with a sony point and shoot while I was already recording, that itself was worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, but the battery must be removed too charge.
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these a couple weeks ago for work. We use them for recording and documenting NDE exams at a nuclear power plant. I like a camera that can get up and real personal with things like damaged bolting, pitting in materials, and Magnaflux exam indications. This camera will do a fine job, it works well for general indoor use and can take great detail with the lens about 4-5 inches from the subject.The camera drops easily into your pants pocket, or into your cargo pants. It is not heavy or bulky at all. In low light, it fires an inferred light to get focused and it works very well.Where they completely dropped the ball is with the charging system. You can not plug a USB cable into it and charge the device. Your forced to remove the battery and place it into a proprietary dock to charge. This is painful when you are using the camera daily, especially when compounded by the fact that the camera drops all date, time and setting memory each time you remove the battery. Ridiculous.It's a shame on the battery, it should have been charged internally and been able to be plugged into a standard micro USB cable on your pc, just like your cell phone is. This reminds of Sony proprietary memory and iPhone/iPod proprietary charging cables. Things that make you want to smack someone.Don't let the battery alone sway you away, because other than that, this would have been a 5 star review. It takes really great pictures, especially at its price point. The pictures from this are great.

Reviews.Title: great pocket digital camera
Reviews.Author: lara
Reviews.Content: We got this camera because we wanted a pocket camera for when we cannot carry the Canon SLR and its lenses (certain travel destinations, nights out, etc). The pictures made with this camera are excellent. It has a great quality lens. It has many useful features. I could easily say it is the best pocket digital camera I have owned, and I am always glad to see that the pictures made with it are way better than my friends pictures made with their own pocket digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: Good camera with two Drive You Nuts quirks
Reviews.Author: Mr. H
Reviews.Content: You have to understand where we came from -- an aged, clunky 4MP Sony that had been dropped in the fine sand of a California beach, pooped on once by accident (a baby), fought over in a divorce, pushed down the stairs by a cat.Compared to that old camera, the DSC-W560 is a gem. But in the bigger picture compared to modern digital cameras, it's average in picture quality but above average in value. It does HD video, has one touch no fuss photo modes, lots of neat features, and a compact profile. The LCD screen on the back is bright and easy to see. It can get amazingly close for macro pictures. Just an inch or two it seems. It can take seamless panorama pictures, automatically detect faces, smiles, and even blinking at the wrong time. It also has a lithium ion rechargeable battery.For the money, it does a lot. The picture quality is average, neither great or bad, full HD video -- though the video is limited to 2GB chunks no matter how big your memory card is, and limited to appx 29 minutes in length. The battery will do several hundred pictures or about 70 minutes of video before quitting.BUT....It has two extremely annoying attributes that really really irritate me. First, you have to remove the battery to charge the camera. It can't be charged internally, and it can't be charged via USB. And second, when you remove the battery to charge it, you have to reset the date, time, time zone, and a few other settings EVERY SINGLE TIME. Not all of them though. Even though the date is important to me, it retains all the quality settings, the sounds, and the miscellaneous settings.I'm in shock that this is even an issue when our ancient digital camera managed this amazing date retention feature despite being 8 years old. The level of irritation by this will shock you. You read this review and think, "I can't believe this guy is so petty he'd whine about that." Look, get the camera and then tell me with a straight face that you really like resetting the date and like having to carry around a separate charger because it can't charge via USB.--Update after 6 months of use. Camera no longer loses date and time with battery removed. Apparently it has a self-healing feature. Bizarre. However, it depletes the battery even when off. I kept yelling at my wife about leaving the battery depleted after use, but I notice that it was draining even after we had it in storage. This is extremely annoying. It will deplete a fully charged battery in a matter of weeks. Because the batteries take many hours to charge, the camera is out of commission for a long time. We have begun removing the battery from the camera when stored.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Camera
Reviews.Author: Arthur J. Deane
Reviews.Content: Astounded by the capabilities of this camera.  In AUTO mode takes great photos under all conditionsJust point and shoot. Used 4MB card with 620 shots  Could not fill on a 10 day holidayAmazed when I downloaded photographs with the detail in the photos and they quality in poor light conditions Sufficient pixels that I could zoom in and crop photo without losing detailVery satisfied customer

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sue D
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera as a birthday gift for my daughter to take on her vacation. She loved it and the pictures came out great. It would have been nice if in the description it mentioned that it came with a battery charger, which we also purchased so now we have two. A few years ago, we purchased a Sony camera and have had excellent results with it so that is why we chose Sony again. Takes great videos, too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera at this price but don't like panaroma image size
Reviews.Author: Happy user
Reviews.Content: Hi all,I would definitely recommend to go for this camera because at this price of $149, you wont find any other camera which is as good as this.  I researched for all other brands before buying this one.  I found that feature wise, Sony Cybershot w560 is the best.  Video recording is HD but eats a lot of battery.  Definitely, because it's not a cam-recorder.So, I would go for it.  I am planning to buy one more to gift someone.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as expected
Reviews.Author: Farm Man "farm man"
Reviews.Content: When I moved up from my old 4 MP Cybershot, I thought this would be a much better camera.This one takes too long to focus, so many shots are out of focus.The flash has a tendency to burn out the subject, seems to set exposure by thebackground, so faces are always washed out. Percentage-wise the old4 Mp cam produced a greater percentage of usable photos.

Reviews.Title: Great specs, but user has no control over them.
Reviews.Author: Wolfmother
Reviews.Content: When I bought this camera, I was excited by the low price for what was a solid focal length/optical zoom bounds choices (the 35mm film equivalent is 30mm-110mm which takes you right from the edge of wide angle to the early early beginnings of telephoto. This would be much preferable to the many 5mm-25mm equivalent cameras which boast "5x optical zoom!", sure 5x but over a range size that's really limited to being useful for landscape and panoramic shots.) and also what was, for cameras of this price, a good maximum aperture (an f-stop of 2.7. A lower f-stop number means higher maximum aperture. A lower f-stop number means you can get more light into camera at once, meaning you can get the same light with a faster shot. This means you can capture action faster, and also capture indoors activity.The 3" screen was icing on the cake. Mechanical Optical Image Stabilization put it above most Kodaks in the same price range. The sensor was only 2.3 (the digital sensor itself probably much smaller) but that's standard for anything less than a few hundred dollars.Here's why I gave this two stars:The camera allows you no control over anything, and it results in worse pictures. It doesn't allow you to control aperture. It doesn't (really) allow you to control focal length because while you get to optical zoom, there's forced automatic focal-length adjustment at time of shot: the designers at Sony have decided that you don't know what you want to focus on, so the camera can decide for you. While auto focal-length adjustment can sometimes be great (taking lots of family pictures in one setting.) in 9/10 scenarios when you're composing a shot or trying to take a picture that looks like what you want it to look like, it's terrible.Please, Sony, I'm not even a professional, but I'd still like to decide how far out the camera's focus should be. Allow the auto-focus to be turned off, and allow more fine tuned adjustment of focal length and shutter speed.That's the other thing, no control over shutter speed. All of these values are either decided by the camera, or maybe you can set a "scene" like "outdoors" and instead of tying directly to a shutter speed, aperture, focal length set of values, it instead merely changes the range of values that the camera will think about when deciding what your shot should look like, and its always a wide range.And no control over aperture either. The 2.8 aperture was THE dealmaker for this camera for me, it means that I can take really good f3.3 photos (photo quality is much better at the f-stop right below the maximum aperture), but no matter what it added up to faster, brighter indoors shots. Nope. I have no control over that either. It's so frustrating, all this (relative to most consumer cameras) hardware, and sony decides that I'm only allowed to handle it with oven mitts. What's worse is that the camera half the time picks the worst value imaginable. Evening, indoors, natural light? Oh, well, a really low level of exposure of F5.0 would be great for that, right? And the image comes out all muddy.The camera's biggest problem: Most good cameras (even consumer grade, near $100 range cameras) allow you to choose what format to save your photos in (a "data lossless" format like PNG or TIFF where the file size is much larger, but all the data the sensor receives is kept, or a "lossy" format like JPG where a lot of data is dropped to save space, and the image stays the same size but becomes lower image quality). The w560 decides that you always always want JPG (it's so helpful) and not only that, you care far far more about space saved than about taking good photos. The camera calibrates the compression for saving space far more than for image quality.For example: The 16 megapixel color photos I've taken so far have all came out as JPGs of about 4 MB size. A color JPG at 16 MB will never fit into 4 MB unless you've dropped a huge amount of the data. At that point you can zoom in and all the pixels are all blocky, because essentially what you're working with is the data equivalent of a 8 MP photo scaled up to 16 MP size. But unlike an 8MP photo, you have all these visual artifacts (strange, jaggedy shapes or color modifications caused by the heavy compression), Good luck making a really nice print that's larger than a postcard with these. And on an 8.5 x 11 you might get a not bad print, but go any larger and one of the major problems with this camera, forced very lossy compression become obvious.This camera is a pile of good hardware straitjacketed in the mentality of the $40 camera you bought at CVS. If you buy a $40 camera at CVS you don't care about picture quality, you have no intention of controlling how it comes out. You just want to point, shoot, click and just have some photo, any photo, to remember the moment by. The people pay $120 for a camera do so because they want to be able to make their pictures look nice. They need to be able to use the tools to do that, rather than crossing their fingers and hoping each time the camera sees fit to use the options for them.

Reviews.Title: Make sure you get a memory card
Reviews.Author: MovieNut "Dave"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this is a very nice little camera.  Easy to set up and use and takes very good pictures.A word of caution.  The camera does not come with a memory card and it will not function without one. It takes two types of card: either a Memory Stick Pro Duo or an SDHC Memory Card.  The old "Memory Stick" cards used in older Sony cameras will NOT fit in this camera.  So either purchase a card from Amazon when you buy the camera or prepare for a trip to the store when the camera arrives (Target sells both types of cards).I recommend purchasing a second battery.  As previous reviewers have noted, the battery must be removed from the camera to be recharged - there is no provision for charging in the camera. Having a second battery available allows you to just pop it into the camera and you're ready to go. If you wish to purchase an additional battery, I can't see why you should purchase the Sony battery for $35.00 when you can purchase a generic brand, which works just fine, for about 5 bucks on Amazon (just do a search on Amazon for "NP-BN1").  Another reviewer commented that removing the battery reset the time and date on his camera, requiring the time and date be set up again.  I didn't have this problem.  Because I got distracted with something else, I left my camera on the table with no battery for several hours.  When I put the fresh battery in, the correct time and date were still programmed.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Pros : Good Pics and good video quality.Cons : Didn't like the appearance. Video also takes the sound of zoom in and zoom out noise.

Reviews.Title: great pocket camera!
Reviews.Author: S. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: this is a really good camera. I bought it for a graduation, I payed a little extra for fast shipping. It came in time and I was pleased with the pictures. Picture quality is really good outdoors. Not so good indoor zoomed shots. For good indoor pics you should be close to the people you're taking pictures of.settings are simple, photo, video, panoramic.Im not a fan of the panoramic, it might be cool to use at the beach though.

Reviews.Title: Great little Camera
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  First camera I have owned that I was surprised by the result.  I am not a camera savvy guy so do not know much about it.  But out of the box this thing takes great pictures on auto.  Wish I would have brought it sooner.  The image stabilization is really good, but occasionally some pictures still come out blurry that is why this camera gets 4 stars.  The sweep panaroma is really good for outdoors.  Just turn it on and move your camera from left to right or vice versa and you have a landscape photo.  All in all, a great camera.

Reviews.Title: The Best Camera at this Price Point
Reviews.Author: Ryan Loiacono
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W560 is (in my opinion) the best camera available today (October, 2011) for the price.  It boasts the following pluses:1.  14.1 MP2.  3.0 LCD Screen3.  4x Optical Zoom4.  Several Available Colors5.  Small Size6.  Amazing Automatic Picture Control (it does every adjustment for you)7.  Really Cool Panoramic Mode8.  Easy to Use Menu's9.  Quick Access to Timer Mode10. Fun "Smile" Mode (automatically takes pictures of people smiling)All of these features for just over $100.  I highly recommend this camera for someone wanting a great, point-and-shoot camera.  You won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Every picture was blurry
Reviews.Author: H. KITE "hkite"
Reviews.Content: I've had 4 Sony Cyber-shots within the last 5 years or so.  I've always loved the quality of the pictures I get with these cameras without too much forethought.  I just put it in "auto" and click away.  However, this camera would not take a clear picture in the auto mode, or any mode.  In fact, every picture I took with it was blurry.  I checked the lens and it seemed to be clear. I'm not sure if I received a defective camera or not as I returned it for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Terrible camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Charlie"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I was so happy with a previous cyber=shot that took great photos.  I played with it in a store and it seemed good.  I read many good reviews also.  However, in practice, it takes terrible photos.  They look good on the LCD screen but when you bring them up on a computer you will see that they are all soft.  My telephone takes better photos than this dedicated camera.  For the price, I did not expect exceptional but I did expect photos to be focused.  I returned the camera.  I didn't need bells and whistles, just sharp photos.

Reviews.Title: Worst camera I ever had
Reviews.Author: Praky
Reviews.Content: This is my third camera. I had sony cybershot 3.0 megapixel and Canon powershot 12MP camera before. Sony DSC-W560 does not come close to my previous cameras.1) The picture is not crisp even though it's a 14MP camera. I can see the gray dots in the pictures.2) Camera flash is really bad. It unevenly puts flash light on the target.3) Indoor pictures taken is wrost ever.4) Movie quality is ok and somewhat close to my 3.0MP camera.I would not recommend this camera to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras!
Reviews.Author: David Oseda "David Oseda"
Reviews.Content: Something that I like about Sony is the great quality! And it's the same with this model! I have tried so many Sony Cameras and I cannot complain! This model is among the best!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Tulein
Reviews.Content: I have no doubt, this camera is great product (excellent price, good performance) just one thing I should add, plan on buying an extra battery, specially if you will be using video,

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: RMEJIA
Reviews.Content: I use it most of all to take pictures not videos. The video quality is fine, don't worry. After trying so many cameras this is by far the best one in quality pictures terms.

Reviews.Title: No Sony next time
Reviews.Author: B. Terry
Reviews.Content: http://www.amazon.com/review/create-review/ref=cm_cr_dp_wrt_btm?ie=UTF8&asin;=B004H8FNM6&channel;=detail-glance&nodeID;=502394&store;=photo#Got this camera about two and a half years ago.  It is attractive and a very convenient size. We don't do a lot of photography, but bought for travel and grandchildren. It does ok with landscapes, but we have been regularly disappointed with people shots.  They are often blurry, the red eye is terrible, colors aren't true, and the shutter speed causes us to miss special moments.  A couple of months ago, it froze up at a crucial moment while traveling.  It began working again until yesterday--yes, Christmas Day.  We will be getting a Canon or Panasonic this time.

Reviews.Title: IT'S A GOOD CAMERA FOR THE PRICE.
Reviews.Author: review it
Reviews.Content: The camera is good and it does the job but picture quality is not the greatest. I take a lot of automobile photos and they don't come as crisp as I would have liked. I use to have an older Cybershot and the picture quality was much better and more clearer then this. I'm still satisfy with it since the price was great and quality is good enough. Also when I take photos of people the picture comes out fuzzy sometime with no movement. Overall its a good camera and battery life is pretty good too.

Reviews.Title: Pleasantly surprised with this camera!
Reviews.Author: Eric Weisberg
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas present for my sister. The price was reasonable and the camera is excellent...a great value! I checked out the camera myself after my sister had opened it and I really liked the ease of use, the interface, and how quickly the camera performed any selected function. The picture quality is great, even in situations where the lighting is not ideal. The compact size is also a plus, in my opinion. I would recommend this camera to anyone considering it.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot with Panoramic view
Reviews.Author: Debra Bieser
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a X=mas present for family. Extremely good price and only camera in price range that had panoramic view option. Easy to use and pictures were great. Bought highest definition memory card to avoid some of picture issues described by others.

Reviews.Title: the most bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: Jane Public
Reviews.Content: This camera takes very clear shots! It's also very smart in the sense that it recognises the change in light so it automatically adjusts to suit the atmosphere e.g. taking shots at night. Also, the panoramic view is quite fun and easy to use! This camera is extremely user-friendly, neat and lightweight which makes carrying around a breeze. I bought the red one - the actual colour of the camera is a tiny bit darker than the one pictured but I actually think the colour is more attractive in person. I'm trying to find something about this camera that I do not like, but I'm coming up empty-handed. I will definitely recommend this camera to someone interested in getting a camera that is to the point without compromising quality of shots and video footage.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera, excellent value
Reviews.Author: Paul "JustMyOpinion"
Reviews.Content: Sony goes through highs and lows in their camera designs. I have owned W-series cameras for years now and if their W-50 series were excellent cameras, the W-100 series were not up to par, but they did a very good job with this W560. It's all in the firmware, the cameras themselves don't change much. The Bionz engine seems a good firmware design. The low-light capabilities are very good for a $100 camera. The only thing I find a bit disconcerting is the size of the camera...not that it's too big, but on the contrary that it's too small. There is a point where too small won't fit people's hands, and this one is borderline. It is hard to grab, it's so thin (I am a man). Other than that, I'd definitely buy another one with similar characteristics, even slightly thicker (higher zoom?).

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: James L. Willis "Bucs Fan"
Reviews.Content: camera arrived on time , and in perfect condition. we have only 50 shots so far-- really like the quality and ease of use. price was good for a real quality camera. why spend anymore for a point and shoot camera? we are happy customers!

Reviews.Title: soundmaster
Reviews.Author: soundmaster
Reviews.Content: This machine definitely works perfect for me. For the price, you can't anything better than this little camera. I'm happy with the overall quality of the images and videos.

Reviews.Title: EASY TO LEARN
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for high school/college students, or for people not particularly fond of learning how to use new gadgets.  It's user friendly to anyone who has experience with basic cell phone or computer menus.  I was happily surprised to find music options along with different ways of viewing slide shows.It's a handy device that Amazon offered at the best price along with best-priced accessories.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cam for the price !
Reviews.Author: KISHORE Salla "Maverick"
Reviews.Content: Takes beautiful pics, nice videos ! Couldn't ask more for the price I paid.I have used three different sony cameras in the recent past, they were all very good

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: MMolina
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for our team to use at work. Great value, takes great pictures and is quick & easy to use. Nothing more you could ask for in a camera.

Reviews.Title: Wish I had done my research and upped my budget
Reviews.Author: J. Colitto
Reviews.Content: It's not a bad camera. Right out of the box it felt cheep and plasticky (body is, in fact, plastic). This is a concern because it's to replace the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W290 (solid build, metal body) my naughty toddler had buried in the sand. Photos with flash are relatively vibrant and in focus but without flash photos are always blurry even with the appropriate settings and in well light places. Wish I had done my research and upped my budget.

Reviews.Title: Cannot charge battery via USB
Reviews.Author: patent_lawyer
Reviews.Content: Lots of other good reviews on here, I'm mainly writing to address one flaw:You cannot charge via USB.To charge the battery you must remove the memory card and battery, put the battery pack in the charger, and plug the charger into an AC outlet.Charging takes 3-4 hours or more.Also, if you leave it connected to the computer via the USB cable, it will drain the battery (even if the computer is off, apparently).Otherwise the camera is generally pretty good.I've only used factory default settings.The image stabilization seems pretty decent, auto-focus is pretty good, and while the camera body is plastic it seems reasonably solid.Again, there are already plenty of in-depth reviews on photo quality.I'd give it 3.5 stars if I could.

Reviews.Title: WARNING! Misleading stock photo!
Reviews.Author: Ian
Reviews.Content: Warning! The stock photo used for the listing is of a steel blue color...the actual color of the camera is purplish and NOT blue! Sony refuses to explain why the camera is purple IRL and not the blue in the pictures they use.Other than that, the camera seems to work pretty well. It responds fast, and the intelligent auto is fairly good for most shots. However like most budget compact cameras it produces blurry photos if there is insufficient light and too much light produces washed out photos, so getting a good balance is kind of tricky.The lens stabilisation works fairly well.One strange thing is that when you plug the camera in to your PC, you have to turn the camera on first (which extends the lens for a few seconds). The LCD screen also stays permanently on while the camera is plugged in, which is completely un-necessary.

Reviews.Title: Sony w560 .... EZ Image Capture
Reviews.Author: Amazon_Flunkie
Reviews.Content: The Sony DSC-W560 Cyber-shot camera will grab images with ease.Point & Shoot .... move on with your life, .... & import the files with a click.Hi-Def 1920x1080 jpeg files are full of details.The package has Sony's PMB software, .... that works OK too.4x Optical zoom is far out.Purchased camera at Best Buy for a few bucks more than Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Nice shot
Reviews.Author: Jose M. Arevalo Moran
Reviews.Content: The camera have good appeal, take nice pictures, nothings outstanding but works for the price you pay.Maybe sony needs to improve this range of cameras I dont feel any important change from my old camera, only the size.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera!
Reviews.Author: Darqstar
Reviews.Content: I love the wide angle feature on this camera.  I've had three other digital cameras, but none of them took wide angle.  When I was house hunting a couple years ago, I was trying to take pictures of the rooms to send my husband, and I wish I'd had this camera, so I could get true pictures rather than the boring "pictures of corners" that my camera had provided.It's also so small that it's very easy to tuck into a pocket and take it along with you.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Sailor "Sailor"
Reviews.Content: Light weight and really good pictures.  It is perfect to put in youe pocket and has video.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Some few times, buying refurbished brings surprises.
Reviews.Author: MEX TEX
Reviews.Content: Came with a failure on the lens that didn't come out.  I had to return this nice looking refurbished camera.

Reviews.Title: good to haves
Reviews.Author: monique11
Reviews.Content: this camera seems like something back in the day type of camera where it seems a new tecnologys the way i always turn it on its attractive pictures come out flawless somthing i cant describe the only word i would have for it to rate a camera good you must first have it long enough to explore it i have just got it a month ago it is so unique the picture quality is nice and the features are something i would play with like a baby with a new toy this camera can last for a durable time its a good model and dosnt come with a card if you get a used 1 thats no problem get 1 mine is a used one and from amazon i ordered it,its perfect all the rest i would say its good for outings indoor or for traveling you wont be disappointed with the quality

Reviews.Title: Fine as a basic camera
Reviews.Author: Cheryl L Webb
Reviews.Content: This camera works fine as a basic camera, which is what I was looking for. No customer service problems or delay in receiving it.

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Wendysocean
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera and the seller was excellent as well. Great prchase!!!! Great camera!!!! The scenes it has is good and quality is good...especially for the money.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! It takes great pictures and it's easy to download shots to my computer. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that, for the price, they really could have included an SD card.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!
Reviews.Author: Anna Gregov
Reviews.Content: I like the small size and design.  It will make a great birthday gift for a friend who wants a digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my girlfriend for Christmas. It takes amazing pictures, and it is super easy to use yet has a plethora of features.

Reviews.Title: A fault
Reviews.Author: Naiomie
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera, but when I got it there was a fault. The review button was not working. You can go on the In-Guide on the camera itself to display the photo you just took out, but that takes time, like four steps to get to that.

Reviews.Title: Good for price.
Reviews.Author: CSkinner2144
Reviews.Content: Overall, good for the price. If you want better quality, then get ready to fork over more money. But if you are looking to save some, then buy this camera. It does everything most point and shoot cameras can, but it is pretty easy to use. Once you set the shooting mode to advanced auto, you don't have to do anything else, just point and shoot. The video is good quality, just make sure to use a tripod or monopod to stabilize the camera while filming. When zoomed out the image can shake a little and it will be fine, but when zoomed in that same amount of shaking will make you nauseous trying to watch the playback. Overall, worth the money, but could be better.

Reviews.Title: Camera on a budget
Reviews.Author: Mark Mancino
Reviews.Content: Camera works well for me.  I take it to our family camp site and take many pictures.  Yes, there are camera's out there that are better but for the price.  This is a great camers.  Also I like the panoramic ability.

Reviews.Title: Good basic camera
Reviews.Author: S. CHHAJED
Reviews.Content: Very basic but a good powerful camera. I got it for gifting it to somebody and they love it and they are happy with quality.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: jason
Reviews.Content: I thought that it was a good camera for the money.  Sometimes it is hard to get the camera to pick the right settings to take the clear picture that you want.  Otherwise, I would have given it a 5.

Reviews.Title: Sony Gift
Reviews.Author: Susana Fernández A
Reviews.Content: It was acquired as a gift.I do not know how it works, but have not received notification of problems.Visually it was like new.The price was very convenient.I received it in box with manual and installation disc, load and data cables, and battery, all in perfect condition, like new.

Reviews.Title: Good camera, not so good battery life.
Reviews.Author: Luis Gómez
Reviews.Content: I would recomend buy an extra battery, other than that is a very good camera, good price and very nice pictures, very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Jen S
Reviews.Content: I bought the Sony just because I was tired of my old camera and wanted a change.  It takes decent pictures.  But the battery doesn't hold it's charge at all.  I will not be buying a Sony next time.

Reviews.Title: Sony  W560
Reviews.Author: dawn oneil
Reviews.Content: Just a Great Camera, takes beautiful pictures and  use it all the time, haven't had a problem with it yet.  Thank You, Dawn

Reviews.Title: Red pictures
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: A really light camera and gets the job done, but sometimes the pictures are a little too on the red side. But, you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Author: EDGAR ALEXANDER CENTENO "PISTOLITA RANGER"
Reviews.Content: excelente producto de calidad  recomendando como lo estaba buscando  excelente servicio de envio a miami y recibido a tiempo estimado

Reviews.Title: Very useful
Reviews.Author: Online "?"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, the only problem is that I keep losing the charger for the battery. I think I may have to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: I love my camera!
Reviews.Author: L.R.
Reviews.Content: I had an older sony camera but my little sister broke it so I decided to get another but newer sony camera. And boy am I pleased with my purchase. Item shipped fast and have been using it ever since!

Reviews.Title: Great Point-and-shoot camera
Reviews.Author: David Andrews
Reviews.Content: This is a great value camera.  A point-and-shoot with enough features to keep the slightly more advanced user happy, and simple enough to give novices great pictures with minimal effort.

Reviews.Title: Camera was just as described, shipping was very quick!
Reviews.Author: brt374
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a replacement for the 16MP Carl Zeiss model that I'd managed to drop and kill within three months of buying it on Black Friday. Not only does this one take just as great of pics, it's so easy to use for both snapping pics and taking video. Just make sure and test out the numerous settings before using it to take pics at a special occasion...I had a bit of trouble at a dinner party with the "smile sensor" feature (my name for it). And if you're notorious for dropping cameras like me, invest in a lanyard so that it fits around your neck (it's small enough to hide in my jacket pocket when I'm not snapping pics).

Reviews.Title: super camera
Reviews.Author: HASTA BHATTARAI
Reviews.Content: Hey friends, last month i got a Sony cyber shot DSC-W560 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3.0-inch LCD (silver) in used form. It was unbelievable like a new one. It's all functions works as a new one. I love to buy more things in amazon.com. Also want to say you that amazon is a right place to buy things that you need.

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: Muy buena camara, las fotografias se ven muy bien. tiene buena resolucion.Es un buen producto. Me siento muy bien con lo que compré

Reviews.Title: awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Cody J. Wisneski "awesome"
Reviews.Content: my girlfriend LOVES to take pictures and for a long time shes been wanting a new camera. so i spent HOURS and days researching cameras. reading review after review and ratings. and i bought this camera. and boy did it not disappoint. it has absolutely everything you need if you want great pictures. whether you just need a camera for the holidays or vacations, or you take 100 pictures every single day, this camera is awesome. it zooms, its quality on the camera looks great. if you have a huge group of people or just want a picture with a lot of trees and nature this has a feature where you move the camera over a huge and wide span of space and it turns it all into one picture, so it captures it all. basically, this camera is the bomb, i dont write reviews but i had to write this one. this camera is amazing

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: RFK
Reviews.Content: This replaced my DSC-W100 Which had problems with the creen after years of use. I like the lighter and small size and am getting used to no viewfinder. So far have had no problems and would recommend for my use which is light personal and travel.

Reviews.Title: great camera!
Reviews.Author: mtiny
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I bought it at a reasonably price and it has been working great for me. I love the panorama options. I took this to New York and I have been able to take nice panoramic photos on the top of the Empire State Buildings. Also, I love how the video on this camera focuses as you point to different things. My previous camera (Canon) did not allowed that. If I shot in macro, I cannot zoom out and focus it on further away images. The only complaint I have is that it takes a little bit too long for you to see the photos after taking it.  I expect a quick transition from taking the photo to viewing it on your camera.I got this camera in black and I love how sleek it looks. I am glad the compact size allows me to carry it in my small purse when I go out at night. Love!

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: M. Mazzaro
Reviews.Content: My grandson was always borrowing my camera when we took them on trips.  He learned how to use it with no problem.  I bought him his own for Christmas (charged it and put it back in the box) so when he opened it he could take pictures immediately.  He had a blast Christmas morning.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC substitute gift for 8yo girl
Reviews.Author: S. Love
Reviews.Content: My little 8yr old friend asked for a Hello Kitty camera for Christmas.  Luckily, I read the reviews on that camera and decided against it.  For about $10 more I was able to purchase this camera and case. Within two days this child was taking various pics, videos and panoramic pics.  She basicly taught herself, something I probably could not even do after reading the instructions.  This item should last her a very long time.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: leonardo
Reviews.Content: Estoy muy contento por muchos factores, primero el precio asequible, el producto combina perfectamente la calidad y economia, segundo, el diseño de la camara Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W560 14.1 MP es atractivo y moderno y lo mejor de todo es que viene con idioma español, es espectacular el producto lo recomiendo al 100%

Reviews.Title: nice camara
Reviews.Author: Carlos Ml Hamilton
Reviews.Content: it's a nice camara to take pictures to upload to facebook and things like this, is good quality and don't have mayor problems. :D

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: The size of this camera is perfect.  It takes great pictures and the zoom is everything I need!  Great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: Loving to shop on Amazon, I started viewing all the digital cameras that were reasonably priced; this quest was for a camera intended to use at school/ field trips/ and special events with students. I was thrilled to find this little gem for under $100, but when it came, I learned that it has no memory card. Grrrr... that has to be ordered separately! Fortunately, I found one on sale (again through Amazon), and I'm happy with the ease of use, the size, and what seems like really good, focused photos. I haven't downloaded any yet, but because it came with a DVD tutorial, it should be easy to understand. So far, I'm very happy with my purchase(s).

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Rivadeneira Luis "Luis Rivadeneira"
Reviews.Content: Haven't tested in many conditions but seems to work as a good point and shoot camera should. The panoramic picture mode is interesting but not as impresive. Nice 3 inch display, delicate piano black finish.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: joshua
Reviews.Content: It was in perfect condition and shipped quickly. I'm happy with this product. I would use this company a thy with.

Reviews.Title: Excellent.
Reviews.Author: aaguirre06
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very well made and high quality finish is very good. Thanks, greetings from Colombia. I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for $99
Reviews.Author: Silicon Valley
Reviews.Content: This is great camera for $99. Best for using in auto-mode.Video quality is not great but good enough for this price.

Reviews.Title: Awsome
Reviews.Author: Juan Benavides "Juan Benavides"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera, I had one before but I lost it and got another one, great resolution nice pics I love sony brand

Reviews.Title: OK but pictures come grainy if you zoom in low light
Reviews.Author: Ravindra Mhatre
Reviews.Content: Overall OK, but not that great as pictures taken in low light are grainy specially with zoom. WX9 would have been a better option.

Reviews.Title: An awesome product!
Reviews.Author: Rafis
Reviews.Content: Sharp pictures, time battery life is right at a time when you go camping, is ideal. Super lightweight and easy to carry. A product that meets consumer expectations standard. Excellent price.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: suncatcher711
Reviews.Content: I've only had this camera for a short time but so far, I love it! The directions are easy to follow and the pictures really come out well. It's a tiny, lightweight camera which I find very easy to keep with me in my bag. I am so thrilled to be able to have a nice little camera with me at all times so I can catch the moments I want to keep. So many interesting features on the camera include smile detection, face detection and soft skin effect. I am still learning how to use most of these features but I will say, this camera is fun!

Reviews.Title: Very Easy to Navigate
Reviews.Author: shsfaithful
Reviews.Content: This digital camera is smaller than expected, which is fine for me.  I love the LCD navigation screen, and I have found it much more intuitive to select features than most digital cameras.  The smile shutter feature is pretty cool, and actually works well. I really like the burst mode, it is a practical feature, it should be a little faster however, perhaps my only complaint about the camera.  Camera is stylish, but would probably be difficult to use for someone with large fingers.

Reviews.Title: Cyber shot
Reviews.Author: Kim Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: great product, easy to use.  I have the bigger version but this one is wonderful because it is so compact

Reviews.Title: Sony CyberShot DSCW560 141 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss VarioTessar 4x WideAngle Optical Zoom Lens and 30inch LCD Bl
Reviews.Author: Suri
Reviews.Content: No need to tell any thing about Sony Camera's they are great. The seller prompt was good, i got it on time. Pretty simple to use, and its worth for what i have spent.

Reviews.Title: sony cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: oskarinabolivar
Reviews.Content: excelente camara se la recomiendo, tiene buen flas y las fotos son nitidas, es comoda para tenerla en cualquier lugar a la hora de utilizar

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Cristi S
Reviews.Content: We just love this camera. It is small enough to fit in your pocket and takes really great pictures. I love that there is no delay between when you push the button and when it takes the picture.

Reviews.Title: Well above average
Reviews.Author: BZapp7
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS GREAT FOR TAKING HIGH QUALITY HD VIDEOS. YOU CAN HEAR THE ZOOM WHILE TAKING VIDS, WHICH IS A BIT ANNOYING. I VERY MUCH LIKE ALL OF THE NEAT FEATURES FOR TAKING PICS. ALSO, FOR EVERYONES INFO THIS THING COMES WITH A BATTERY, A USB CORD, AND A CHARGER (INCASE YOUR ARE CONFUSED).OVERALL I WOULD CONSIDER IT A GREAT BUY FOR 130.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W560 1...
Reviews.Author: California Girl
Reviews.Content: I researched all cameras in the $90 to $150 range and best choices were the one I bought (Sony 560.The camera seems sturdy enough but the viewfinder and what you end up with are dissimilar... I always end up with a lot of 'ceiling' in photos.Quality seems good, ease of use good, features are good.I used to have a Canon which I loved, this is a reasonable substitute, especially at $99.Forward to:A year or so later..... I will never buy Sony again, the camera's dial does not work, the flash is erratic, and when I called customer service they were not willing to help.... unless a 5% discount on another Sony product, counts.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: RAYHAN CHOWDHURY
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera for the price,only flow I can see is that Zoom is only 4x and Lcd resulation is only 23K Pixels and Sony warrenty service is sucks as well as customer service

Reviews.Title: Defect with lens
Reviews.Author: Alex and Sarah
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately we got this camera which we absolutely LOVED...except there is a lens defect apparently in every camera by this model...called PINCUSHION DISTORTION.  If you're standing off to the side of the picture and lets say you put your hand up to wave, everything around the edges of the pic turn out much LARGER in size than the center (like your head)....so it looks like your hand is larger than your head right next to it.  My arm looked massive in one pic where I was sitting to the side of the picture....at first it's not as noticeable because you don't necessarily take shots that you'd be able to tell....then start noticing it a lot more and realize all the shots are like this.  We returned it, got our money back, and bought the same camera, different model (don't remember which one we decided one)....It might have been the 350??I wouldn't get this MODEL but the CAMERA we liked!  Colors were great.  :-)

Reviews.Title: Not impressed.
Reviews.Author: Jesse
Reviews.Content: The quality of the camera is fine, the features are nice, and there's a lot of tweaking ability. But we can not get good pics of our boys in the house. I know that maybe asking a lot, but that's the truth. We were hoping we wouldn't have to take the plunge into the SLR market but it looks like we will.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Mantias
Reviews.Content: excelente producto, era lo que en realidad estaba esperando, me llego a tiempo, excelente compra, .) :) :) :) :)

Reviews.Title: Major disappointment
Reviews.Author: Sally B. Thompson "Sal"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because my very first digital camera was a Sony, I loved the picture quality, and it lasted me 8 years with no problems.  It was finally time to upgrade.I'm not a photographer, nor do I know anything about the settings, but I do like good quality photos.  This was a nice mid-price-range model that seemed to have good specs.Within the first 3 months, I was disappointed in several things...1) The camera is very slow: turning on, reviewing photos, taking pictures.2) It started jumping around on its own.  Even if the switch is set to take still shots, it will jump back and forth between panorama and video continually.3) The picture quality.  I've never learned about photography, but with my last Sony Cyber Shot, I could take photos that came out beautifully.  This time around, I have to edit every single photo with computer software to get it to look natural.4) I have now had it just over one year and even though I have never charged the battery unless it was completely dead, it doesn't last more than a couple of hours anymore.I would have returned the camera if I hadn't moved overseas.  Will try a different brand next time.

Reviews.Title: Sony is Sony
Reviews.Author: Jesus O.
Reviews.Content: We are very pleased with the new camera, bought it to replace the DSC 200, 2.7-inch screen vs inch. I almost bought another camera for other brand with new technology such as wifi  and touch screen ... but Sony is Sony. I am amazon's fan  I invite all  to buy a trusted site, good prices and variety of items. Greetings.

Reviews.Title: small but powerful digital camera
Reviews.Author: ABM SAIFUL ALAM
Reviews.Content: Sony cyber-shot DSC-560 is small but powerful digital camera with 4x optical zoom. It is a handy tool to take quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: GC
Reviews.Content: I just ordered it. It looks great and works very well so far. It is very light and hope this is an advantage not disadvantage.

Reviews.Title: CAMERA DSCW560
Reviews.Author: Mireya
Reviews.Content: Mi cámara estuvo trabajando muy bien, con buena resolucion y nitidez durante unos 30 dias (la compre en Jul 06 2011). Lamentablemnte, siendo hoy Agosto 15, y desde hace unos 5 dias atras dejó de funcionar, se prende, sale el lente, pero el LCD no se ve está obscuro y estoy tratando de solicitar la garantía a SONY USA. Ya que yo resido fuera de los USA. El unico inconveniente de este tipo de compras /internet/ es que el representante de SONY en Ecuador no responde por la garantía ya que la compra fue hecha en USA...Recomiendo que de alguna manera haya un acuerdo o protocolo a seguir para este tipo de casos.Saludos

Reviews.Title: Terrible
Reviews.Author: tashy
Reviews.Content: I had the camera less than a month and the battery stop working, pictures were fuzzy, poor quality, I really love Sony cameras but after this one I wnt be  getting another :( really disappointed

Reviews.Title: Camera ok, Zoom sucks
Reviews.Author: Auriya
Reviews.Content: I got the camera because it could focus quickly and get me a decent shot. Or so I thought.It actually ends up blurring most shots, even when I am holding still and so is my subject. I end up taking 15 pictures to get one or two that are clear and not blurry. I find myself looking at my pictures and saying gee, that would be a lovely shot IF IT WASN'T BLURRy. It seems that ONLY when the flash goes off will I get a shot that is clear. So daytime shots are out...But the thing that makes me really mad is that the zoom for this camera stinks. If you even zoom in ONE LITTLE BIT it makes for a picture that is grainy and very poor quality, even on the highest image quality settings. No matter the lighting, settings, flash or what not, if you zoom in at all your picture will look like a sand painting.And when I tried to post a review on Sony's site for this camera as soon as I rated it as less than 3 stars their site mysteriously and suddenly jumped pages and posted "this section of reviews is no longer available" and when I tried to revisit the site from the google link, it said it wasn't available to me.Hmmmmmm.... Bad Sony, no cookie! customer lost, last Sony product I will ever buy.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot W 560
Reviews.Author: Bven7538
Reviews.Content: The camera i received after my purchase from Amazon is just amazing. The image quality is good and is probably the best Christmas gift I can get back home this December. Thanks to Amazon and its vendors for making it special.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: Leyla
Reviews.Content: el equipo es espectacular me encanta la experiencia con sony es lo maximo, compre un equipo nuevo economico y me llego a tiempo, estoy feliz gracias!! la experiencia con el vendedro fue muy buena lo recomiendo con los ojos cerrados peronas muy responsable y eficiente 100% confiables.

Reviews.Title: Camera is okay
Reviews.Author: j9bork
Reviews.Content: I like the Sony camera however my old camera allowed me to use the sandisk to upload photos.  Now I have to find the cable and hook it up to my computer each time I want to upload photos.  So I dont use it as much.

Reviews.Title: It's a nasty camera after 3 years!!
Reviews.Author: Michelle Gregory
Reviews.Content: I got this camera a few years ago and sometimes works and sometimes freezes, doesn't turn on, lens don't close all the way, etc. It's very frustrating!! It makes a scratchy or humming noise when recording and makes a chirping/humming noise when I am about to record. It's fine the first year then it kind of gets... hard to use and hard to put up with. I have dropped it 10 times and it's probably one of the reasons she doesn't work well. If you buy this camera, if you drop it, it starts to not work do not buy for small children to have fun with because, like I said, drop it, it don't work well.

Reviews.Title: Missed out
Reviews.Author: Budd Christman
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas present, so not used as yet.  Cost was $99.00 from amazon.  The day I got it, Best Buy had it on sale for $89.00  Not worth the hassle to rewrap and send back.  First time I know of that amazon didn't meet or beat the local shops.  Check around before buying.

Reviews.Title: Really Bad
Reviews.Author: ivan vasquez
Reviews.Content: i had a bad experience with this camera, all the pictures that took were white, the camera fixed a day and it became to damage, to the aim I could not have photos of my honeymoon,that bad experience with this item, only the good thing is the policy of return of amazon

Reviews.Title: Its going back
Reviews.Author: I am the man
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera largely because I thought it ran on AAs.  It doesn't, Amazon does not include battery info for most of the cameras - which is infuriating to me.Picture quality is no better than then the cheapy Canon.  If you want a camera of this quality get something cheaper.  The screen is nicer and it might look cooler coming out of your purse, but its really a pretty weak camera, I'd be pleased at $60.

ProductInfo.Features:
Capture your videos in HD Movie mode (720p)
Capture breathtaking images in Sweep Panorama Mode
14.1 megapixel 3-inch LCD screen for easy viewing
Optical SteadyShot image stabilization reduces blur
iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-W560 14.1 MP Digital Still Camera with Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar 4x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens and 3.0-inch LCD (Silver)
